todos.title: Win in Your Mind
todos.body: Victorious warriors win first in their minds and then go to war.

todos.title: Offense
todos.body: Think offense all the time.

todos.title: Sympathetic v. Parasympathetic
todos.body: Stress v. no balance.  Recognize when you are in one stage or the other.

todos.title: Simplify the Battlefield
todos.body: Simple is harder than complex.  Less but better.  (“Not Simple Enough.” – Jobs)

todos.title: Silence
todos.body: Silence helps you control your mind and clear it for optimal thinking.

todos.title: Mantras
todos.body: Say to yourself “day by day I am getting better and better.”

todos.title: Leadership
todos.body: Privilege, not an entitlement.  Know when you need to step aside and don’t be afraid to say so.

todos.title: Purpose
todos.body: Know your purpose and bulletproof your mission.  Attack it from every angle.

todos.title: 20X
todos.body: Humans are capable of doing twenty times what they think they can.

todos.title: HVT (“High Value Targets”)
todos.body: High value targets are the 20% that lead to 80% results.  It takes discipline to hit HVTs instead of going after low hanging fruit.

todos.title: Mental Toughness
todos.body: Get mentally and emotionally tough so that quitting is a choice, not a result.

todos.title: Direct Your Mind
todos.body: Don’t let monkey mind take over.  DIRECT.  Detect useless thoughts.  Interdict and simply let them flow by.  Redirect yourself to a constructive thought.  Energize the constructive thought.

todos.title: Explore Your Options
todos.body: Don’t get stuck with one option to achieve your plan, formulate multiple options in parallel.

todos.title: Extra
todos.body: Don’t be an extra in someone else’s story, create your own story.

todos.title: Seal Motto
todos.body: Do today what others won’t so that you can do tomorrow what others can’t.

todos.title: Strategy v. Goal
todos.body: Decide on your passion and purpose, you can allow strategies to fail fast but never abandon the larger goal.

todos.title: Re-invent
todos.body: Break things and remake them.  Retrain your brain when you find new processer, methods, etc.

todos.title: Deep Breathing
todos.body: Before you take any action you must control your mind by calming it down through slow breathing.

todos.title: Shoot, move, and communicate
todos.body: Act, re-position, and share information.  Observe your position, orient to new reality, decide on an action, act, and send feedback.

todos.title: HVT Focus
todos.body: A seal sniper knows they must hit one target at a time and cannot shift focus until that one target is down.

todos.title: Weak Link
todos.body: A chain is only as strong as its weakest link, fix or remove the weakest link.

todos.title: Pareto
todos.body: 20% leads to 80% results.

todos.title: FITS
todos.body: 1. Does target fit your team’s skills?  2. Is it really important for goal?  3. Is the timing right to go after it?  4. Is the target simple and clear?

todos.title: Trust Your Gut
todos.body: Your stomach is your little brain.  It has millions of neurons that gather information about the body and can sense when something is wrong.

todos.title: Goals
todos.body: When it’s obvious that a goal can’t be reached, adjust your approach and increase your ambitions.

todos.title: Determine Your Unique Offer
todos.body: What can you do for the mission better than anyone else.

todos.title: Rituals
todos.body: Wake up half an hour early to exercise, do yoga, meditate.

todos.title: Control Your Response
todos.body: Use breathing to control your stress and to respond rationally.

todos.title: Break Things
todos.body: The moment you say you know everything or know the best way to do something, you are setting yourself up for failure.  Always be striving to learn and recreate the way things are done for the better.

todos.title: Future
todos.body: The best way to predict your future is to create it (Abraham Lincoln).

todos.title: Visual Storytelling
todos.body: Tell the story using clear visualizations.

todos.title: Mental Toughness
todos.body: Success is largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.

todos.title: Emotional Resilience
todos.body: See failure as a stepping stone, not a crutch.  Look for the silver lining in everything.  Don’t let failure go to waste.

todos.title: Fear
todos.body: Rid yourself the fear of pain, suffering, failure, and death.

todos.title: Dirt Dive
todos.body: Rehearse until you win an action in your mind.  1. See it, 2. Imagine a successful outcome, 3. Practice how you get there.

todos.title: Positive Self Talk
todos.body: Quiet your mind and send yourself the positive vibes you need to be successful.

todos.title: Rubber Band
todos.body: Put a rubber band around your wrist and snap it every time you have a useless negative thought.

todos.title: Be Decisive
todos.body: Make few decisions and stick with them.  Second guessing your decisions will destroy momentum.  When making decisions, stand up straight, look people in the eye and don’t say anything after you’ve made your decision.

todos.title: Problems
todos.body: If your looking for a big opportunity seek out a big problem.

todos.title: Cheating
todos.body: If you ain’t cheating you ain’t trying.  Don’t be liars and cheats but do push the envelope.

todos.title: Embrace the Suck
todos.body: I am only an average man God, but I work harder than an average man.  Endure pain better than others.  Laughter helps cure pain.

todos.title: Be Grateful
todos.body: Every day list all the things you are grateful for.

todos.title: Eliminate Distractions
todos.body: Eliminating distractions helps us see the simplicity.

todos.title: Relaxed Awareness
todos.body: Defocus your eyes and allow information to flow into the mind.

todos.title: Debrief
todos.body: Debrief as soon as you can after completing or failing at a big mission.

todos.title: Mind, Body, Heart, Gut, Spirit
todos.body: Be mentally tough and smart, be physically capable, be emotionally resilient, develop intuition and awareness, and be spiritual.  See Mind, Body, Heart, Gut, Spirit Checklist.
